name: The Great Filter
description:
The Great Filter is a tower-defense game with a twist: you are the projectile!

Tower Guide:

  • (W) Cannon (cost 50): standard shot
  • (A) Rocket (cost 80): long range, high speed
  • (S) Cloner (cost 120): periodically shoots clones in the direction you set
  • (D) Bottle (cost 30) increases movement speed

Game ends on Wave 15.

Created for Mini Jam 84.

Bug  should be fixed as of July 15th, 2021.

**Note: There is currently a bug where occasionally the player will straight up get deleted when trying to use a tower. I will fix this bug very soon. Until then, to avoid this, try and make sure you are close to the center of any tower you are trying to use.
